Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: Roles describe what an OpenCms user should and can do. A role controls the permissions of users wrt. system specific functions. Here, you can get an overview on the available roles.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Each OpenCms user acts in a special role - reaching from root administrators to element authors. Learn about the available roles and the permissions implied by a role.
